title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3339/84 of 27 November 1984 on the application of Decision No 1/84 of the EEC- Switzerland Joint Committee - Community transit - amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit - Decision No 1/84 of the EEC-Switzerland Joint Committee - Community transit- of 25 October 1984 amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 3339/84
of 27 November 1984
on the application of Decision No 1/84 of the EEC-Switzerland Joint Committee - Community transit - amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision No 1/84 of the EEC-Switzerland Joint Committee - Community transit - amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of rules on Community transit shall apply in the Community.
The text of the Decision is attached to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 November 1984.
For the Council
The President
P. BARRY
(1) OJ No L 294, 29. 12. 1972, p. 2.
(2) OJ No L 174, 29. 6. 1978, p. 31.
(3) OJ No L 348, 31. 12. 1979, p. 41.
DECISION  No 1/84 OF THE EEC-SWITZERLAND JOINT COMMITTEE
- Community transit-
of 25 October 1984
amending the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit
THE JOINT COMMITTEE,
Having regard to the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Swiss Confederation on the application of the rules on Community transit, and in particular Article 16 (3) (a) thereof,
Whereas Decision No 2/78 of the Joint Committee added to the Agreement an Appendix II A relating to the introduction, on an experimental basis, of a Community transit declaration form for use in an automatic or electronic data-processing system; whereas that Appendix II A was amended by Decision No 2/79; whereas the validity of the said Decisions was extended by Decision No 2/82 of the Joint Committee until 31 December 1984;
Whereas it has been found necessary to provide for use of the said form beyond that date; whereas the aforementioned Decisions should, therefore, be extended,
HAS DECIDED AS FOLLOWS:
Article 1
Decisions No 2/78 and No 2/79 of the Joint Committee, last extended by Decision No 2/82 of the Joint Committee, are hereby extended until 31 December 1986.
Article 2
This Decision shall enter into force on 1 January 1985.
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1984.
For the Joint Committee
The Chairman
R. GIORGIS
